messages.message:
Hey everyone - Cypress CI being blocking is officially on. You should start seeing PRs being blocked by it. Here's one of mine, exciting!! https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57068

What this means is that we need to get the tests fixed ASAP because they will now slow everyone down in the meantime. Priority number one!!!!

@Paul H @danny.lan @CJ @Udit @Arjun @mfichman @Aayush, all hands on deck!!

(in cases of emergency, an EM can force merge a PR for you)
We'll probably need EMs to merge the actual cypress test fixes
I’m checking on this, cause yeah, my cypress fix is blocked by failing cypress.
yeah — i think the diffing algo isn’t great so if any fixes require actual code changes it will run all(?) the tests and the failing ones will block
if the fix is just contained to the cypress test it should be fine

btw i have 2 PRs for fixing Cypress tests that are currently blocked bc of other Cypress failures
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57075 makes `run-public-app`, `aihub-quick-clean-refinement`, and `view-my-hub` less flaky, but other tests are failing in the CI run
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57077 makes some frontend and backend changes to fix the “Apps” page, which is necessary for `view-apps` and `loginless-sample-results` to pass
i’ve pinged Lydia to force merge when she has a chance
@Serena I'll send these to the EMs to be force merged
@Serena lmk if you want more reviews on that second one or if I should send it to be force merged

Can we get a status update about which test fixes are being looked at? Mine:
• I have a fix up for converse-project-crud
• converse/billing is failing intermittently due to a backend race condition, we may have to skip it until we migrate to metronome

i think @Paul H is looking at these 3
• BuildApp/aihub-split-classification.spec.ts
• BuildApp/aihub-redigitization.spec.ts
• BuildApp/aihub-single-classification.spec.ts

@CJ i see that you replied to https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C029ZG026GZ/p1715180003864709?thread_ts=1715146224.916999&cid=C029ZG026GZ with :workinprogress:  - are you currently working on fixing aihub-templates?
Sorry it’s taking a while — these tests are confusing when there’s different environments and feature flags floating around
sigh `ViewApp/loginless-sample-results.spec.ts` will continue to fail in CI runs until the backend changes from https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57077 are deployed on crafting-aihub
you can always force a crafting-aihub push
yeah lydia is asking about that now in <#C05L87V014J|> since xindi’s big routing PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57009) was just merged
